author: sky.cactus
content: The idea with payment channels is just to make it so the user has ownership of the tokens ASAP (can do payouts every second or minute if you want) without incurring any costs.

author: sky.cactus
content: The user can then settle the payment channel at their leisure and use whatever tools they want from there.

author: sky.cactus
content: This way Ethermine doesn't have to have custody of hasher funds for any longer than a very brief period of time, and you can push the operating cost of withdraws onto the hashers.

author: sky.cactus
content: It gets even easier with mixed-custody system (limited trust, but not trustless).
